attributes.action: To nominate Henry Allingham for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This man is 112 years old he is the last British serviceman alive to have volunteered for active duty in the First World War.He witnessed the slaughter of millions of young men he is unique in that he saw action on land, sea and air Royal Naval Air Service.
We feel this man deserves a Knighthood for the service he has given to Britain much much more than the people who are given awards for far less contribution such as sporting, media & the like.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
